description: Details pursuant to condition 5 of outline planning permission ref: 15/2039/OUT and as amended by 17/04670/VAR, and proposed variation by 19/03624/VAR in respect of layout, scale, appearance, access, landscaping in relation to Phases 3A and 4 of Alma Estate for the construction of 3 apartment buildings and 13 houses varying between 3 and 7 storeys in height, comprising 303 residential units in total, Class A1 retail units uses and provision of public open space, private and semi-private amenity space, refuse/recycling and bicycle storage, on and off street car parking together with conditions for tree protection (9), ecology and biodiversity strategy (31), drainage strategy (35), green roofs (36), living walls (37), energy strategy (38), green procurement plan (42), SWMP (44), parking (52), loading/unloading (54), delivery and servicing (57), car park management (58), traffic calming (59), cycle parking (60). Following submission of this application, subsequent amendments have been made. In summary, these comprise the following:- Phase 2 reconfigured internal layout and remains at 228 units. Phase 4 reduced to 75 units, Phase 4 reconfigured internal layout and height reduced by one storey to 5 (with setback retained). Tenure mix update in both phases and Amended housing mix in both phases.
